entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -39.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 03:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -39.5°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -43.4°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 58. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clear. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. Wind chill minus 54 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
